Secrets In 
      The Sand 
Saturday, June 23, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT
 
A young couple, April and 
      Justin Barber, were on a deserted beach in St. Augustine, Fla., for their anniversary. Then, there 
      was a sudden attack – April was killed; Justin was shot four times but 
      survived.
 
Was he just lucky? Or did he 
      pull the trigger?
 
Harold Dow reports for 48 Hours Mystery, Saturday, 
      June 23 at 10 p.m. ET/PT.
 
Watch Dow's Reporter's 
      Notebook.
